file_content.text: I don't know what the Republic's up to, but I'll find out. Mark my words.
Stay where you are. I'm an innocent non-combatant!
There will be galactic ramifications for what you've done. You attacked an Imperial research facility unprovoked!
You're building an army of HK droids to attack the Republic.
I had just cause.
We're certainly trying. Your interference won't set us back any more than we already are.
Your research could give the Empire an unacceptable edge.
This factory is a threat.
I'd like to let you believe that delusion, but this factory's produced mostly scrap metal.
You going to say those droids chose to attack me?
You provoked me.
At the business end of a blaster, would you do any different?
I'm pretty sure the Imperial army shot first.
Not entirely.
Whoever taught them to aim should be court-martialed.
Let's not play games.
It's clear you're here to steal Imperial property. It's unfortunate you risked so much for so little.
Research facility? Please.
The HK chassis is everywhere. You know where you are, even if I've done my duty and tried to convince you otherwise.
Our HK droids are incomplete. They lack essential programming that's been lost for years.
Besides, the HK droids are lethal assassins. I doubt any Republic scientist has the ingenuity or the stomach to finish them.
Our research is a little more advanced. All I need is the obedience subroutine.
You're wrong.
The subroutine? But... it's useless without a programmed HK.
He's technically an Imperial, but he told me what I need. The obedience subroutine.
I know a guy.
No. Not Banikou. He wasted countless droids by pitting them against Imperial marksmen! He's mad!
Give me the obedience subroutine. Now.
I'm getting impatient.
You've got a functioning HK. I don't know how or where, but you must. There. Enjoy him while you can.
When the Empire learns what's happened here, they'll hunt you and your HK down. The Republic's plans will fail! You'll all die!
The Empire will be more upset when they find out you helped me.
You should run.
It was under extreme duress! I have witnesses! Uh, the droids....
You're the only witness left.
Good point. [Kill him]
No, wait!
Assault protocols active. Destroy the intruder!
